entry.title: morningstarxcdcode/K3sUltraStarter: K3sUltraStarter is a lightweight Kubernetes setup project featuring a sample React frontend and FastAPI backend. It provides easy deployment, management, and validation of a full-stack app on Kubernetes, streamlining development and testing workflows.
entry.content: K3sUltraStarter is a lightweight Kubernetes setup project featuring a sample React frontend and FastAPI backend. It provides easy deployment, management, and validation of a full-stack app on Kubernetes, streamlining development and testing workflows.

entry.title: DipanshuPuri/CanteenConnect: CanteenConnect is a lightweight, responsive web platform that streamlines the order placement and management process for university canteens. The goal is to digitize the food ordering system, enabling students to place orders from their devices and view real-time updates, while the canteen staff manage and fulfill orders efficiently from their end.
entry.content: CanteenConnect is a lightweight, responsive web platform that streamlines the order placement and management process for university canteens. The goal is to digitize the food ordering system, enabling students to place orders from their devices and view real-time updates, while the canteen staff manage and fulfill orders efficiently from their end.

entry.title: orc13a/AmbuStatus: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.
entry.content: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.

entry.title: khanhngo22/HabiSave: A lightweight, responsive web platform for setting, tracking, and achieving personal savings goals. Built with a focus on simplicity, optional Open Banking integration, and gamified progress tracking to help digital-native users cultivate smart saving habits.

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
